thread.title: Terry J.Ignacio

author: Terry J.Ignacio
title: Terry J.Ignacio
text: The boater's course is a fare and viable information source that assists with the knowledge of safe boating, and safe environmental factors. Before taking the course and the boater's exam I thought I knew a lot. After the course, I had a new attitude about the safety for me as well as for my passengers. The course gave me a whole new prospective about the dangers of the ocean, the protection of wild species as well as humpback whales. I feel more cautious about my boats' equipment and how it promotes safety regulations. Overall I am much more knowledgeable about pre- boating, ocean trips , and post-boating procedures. Thank you! With the knowledge that you have provided, I look forward to enjoying my fishing adventures with my friends and family.
